Text:
Thanks, been waiting for new Colbert report for days! 
BTW, any luck posting the Aug.29 episode?

So true, 10912362.

This week has been the driest spell for TDS and TCR that I've seen for a very long time. I do hope we eventually see a TCR.08.29.

Also, it will be interesting to see if the regular UL's realize that, this week, both TDS and TCR atypically have Friday shows (that's tonight, 08.31).
